meanings.sent1: The team had an unofficial meeting to plan the surprise party.
meanings.sent2: She received an unofficial warning about her behavior at work.
meanings.sent3: It was unofficial, but everyone knew about the secret handshake.
meanings.sent4: The cat declared the mouse an unofficial playmate.
meanings.sent5: The unofficial club had a secret password for entry.

meanings.sent1: The unofficial dress code for the event was casual attire.
meanings.sent2: He wore unofficial attire to the formal dinner.
meanings.sent3: The unofficial announcement was made over the loudspeaker.
meanings.sent4: The treehouse served as their unofficial clubhouse.
meanings.sent5: The unofficial agreement was sealed with a handshake.

meanings.sent1: They had an unofficial picnic in the park.
meanings.sent2: The unofficial gathering turned into a dance party.
meanings.sent3: The unofficial dress code allowed for jeans and t-shirts.
meanings.sent4: The unofficial chat over coffee lasted for hours.
meanings.sent5: The unofficial meeting at the cafe was full of laughter.
